requirements.description: Partner will use the Services in accordance with this Agreement and the Services Documentation.
Partner must comply with all Applicable Rules, including data protection and privacy laws and rules.
Partner will handle End Users' data in a manner consistent with the rules applicable to data being accessed, collected, used, and/or shared.
Partner must post a privacy policy in their App that complies with all applicable rules, laws, acts, and regulations.

The privacy policy must disclose to End Users any information that will be provided to ironSource or is accessible to ironSource in connection with the Services, as detailed in the IronSource Mobile Privacy Policy.

type.summary: Disclosure of Data Sharing with ironSource(Third-party partners)

requirements.description: If applicable, the privacy policy must include a mechanism for End Users to opt-out of receiving targeted ads based on their behavior and interests.
Partner confirms having read and understood the IronSource Mobile Privacy Policy and that it does not conflict with Partner's privacy policy.

type.summary: Understanding and Non-Contradiction of Privacy Policies

requirements.description: 合作伙伴将根据本协议和服务文档使用服务。
合作伙伴必须遵守所有适用规则，包括数据保护和隐私法律法规。
合作伙伴将按照适用于被访问、收集、使用和/或共享的数据的规则处理最终用户的数据。
合作伙伴必须在其应用程序中发布符合所有适用规则、法律、法案和法规的隐私政策。
隐私政策必须向最终用户披露将提供给ironSource或ironSource可以访问的任何信息，具体内容详见IronSource移动隐私政策。

type.summary: 披露与ironSource（第三方合作伙伴）共享的数据

requirements.description: 如适用，隐私政策必须包括最终用户选择退出基于其行为和兴趣的定向广告的机制。
合作伙伴确认已阅读并理解IronSource移动隐私政策，并且它与合作伙伴的隐私政策没有冲突。

type.summary: 隐私政策的理解和不冲突
